64GB: SanDisk Ultra 64GB microSDXC UHS-I Card

128GB: Lexar 128GB 633x microSDXC UHS-1

200GB: SanDisk Ultra 200GB microSDXC UHS-I card

256GB: Samsung Evo Plus 256GB"

唔好令其他人覺得香港人係咁
